verse.name: v1
c1
verse.lines: Hiding in Thee, hiding in Thee, Thou blest “Rock of Ages,” I’m hiding in Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: In the calm of the noontide, in sorrow’s lone hour, In times when temptation casts o’er me its pow’r; In the tempests of life, on its wide, heaving sea, Thou blest “Rock of Ages,” I’m hiding in Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: How oft in the conflict, when pressed by the foe, I have fled to my Refuge and breathed out my woe; How often, when trials like sea billows roll, Have I hidden in Thee, O Thou Rock of my soul.
